text: Gérard Rozenknop (born 23 January 1950 in Paris 19e), is a French aerospace engineer. He was head of the French Civil Aviation University from the 6th of January 1999 to the 28th of November 2008. DÉCRET DU 5 JANVIER 1999 PORTANT NOMINATION DANS L'EMPLOI DE DIRECTEUR DE L'ECOLE NATIONALE DE L'AVIATION CIVILE Graduate from the École Polytechnique (1969) and the French Civil Aviation University (1972), he has done a career at the French civil aviation authorities and at the International Civil Aviation Organization Gérard ROZENKNOP GÉRARD ROZENKNOP before becoming head of the French Civil Aviation University. Décret du 27 novembre 2008 portant nomination du directeur de l'Ecole nationale de l'aviation civile - M. Houalla (Marc) == Further reading == * Académie nationale de l'air et de l'espace and Lucien Robineau, Les français du ciel, dictionnaire historique, Le Cherche midi, June 2005, 782 p.
